## Naql.reform() method

Applies the array reformers to array of parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reform(parameters: Parameter[], reformers: Reformer<Parameter>[]): Parameter[];
```

|  reformers | <code>Reformer&lt;Parameter&gt;[]</code> |  |
